$Gene Tenace called for a pitchout when the Indians tried a squeeze play; in the ensuing rundown, Sal Bando tagged Graig Nettles; Indians manager Alvin Dark ran out and argued with 3B umpire Lou DiMuro that Tenace had obstructed Nettles; DiMuro asked HP umpire Bill Haller, who ruled that Tenace did obstruct Nettles and allowed the latter to score; Athletics manager Dick Williams then argued the reversal but the obstruction held1971OAK.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$Vida Blue thought he had struck out Mike Hershberger on the 2-2 pitch; when he walked Hershberger, Blue glared at HP umpire Dave Phillips; Athletics Manager Dick Williams went to the mound and waited for Phillips to come out; Williams talked to Phillips for a while before returning to the dugout1971OAK.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
